CustomField.formula:
AND(
NOT(ISBLANK(Name)), NOT(ISBLANK(MccCode__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(PaymentAlert__c)), NOT(ISPICKVAL(BlockRefund__c, '')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(BankSlipEmailService__c, '')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(BankSlipSmsService__c, '')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(PixEmailService__c, '')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(EmailPackage__c, '')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(PaymentConfirmationEmailService__c, '')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(SmsPackage__c, '')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(PaymentLinkEmailService__c, '')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(OneClickBuyingTokenization__c, '')),
OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Segmento__c, 'Dropshipping')), AND( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Segmento__c, 'Dropshipping'), NOT(ISPICKVAL(PodReminder__c, '')) ) ),
OR( Opportunity__r.Payout__c = FALSE, AND( Opportunity__r.Payout__c = TRUE, NOT(ISPICKVAL(AccountModel__c, '')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(ReviewPayeeRegistration__c, '')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(TransactionType__c, '')) ) ),
OR( NOT(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Metodos_Pagamento__c, 'Boleto Flash')), AND( INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Metodos_Pagamento__c, 'Boleto Flash'), NOT(ISPICKVAL(AutomaticCancellation__c, '')), NOT(ISBLANK(NumberOfDays__c)) ) ),
OR( NOT(INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Metodos_Pagamento__c, 'Cartão de Crédito Nacional')), AND( INCLUDES(Opportunity__r.Metodos_Pagamento__c, 'Cartão de Crédito Nacional'), NOT(ISBLANK(DefaultSoftDescriptor__c)),
OR( NOT(OR( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.IntegrationType__c, "JS"), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.IntegrationType__c, "API") )), AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.IntegrationType__c, "JS"), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.IntegrationType__c, "API") ), NOT(ISPICKVAL(CreditCardRecurrence__c, '')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(InstallmentRecurrence__c, '')) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Completed
